attributes.action: Petition against funding the personal lifestyles of the Monarchy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we the taxpayer have to fund the royal family when they are among the wealthiest family in the world? While we fund their extravagant lifestyles, our NHS, transport system (london especially) for example are suffering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
